org.transitime.db.hibernate

Class AnnotatedClassesList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.hibernate.AnnotatedClassesList

  • public class AnnotatedClassesList
extends java.lang.Object
    Yes, this is a nuisance. If Hibernate Session class is used instead of the JPA EntityManager class then all annotated classes have to be explicitly added to the Configuration object. Don't want to get into using the JPA EntityManager class for now (just trying to learn Hibernate based on books such as Harnessing Hibernate). So need to do this. These annotated classes could also be listed in the hibernate.cfg.xml config file but that would be difficult to maintain. Each application might already have a modified hibernate config file. Don't want to have to have each app modify their config file when new annotated classes are added. Therefore it is best to configure these classes programmatically.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
